text: Tim Pawlenty was the Governor of Minnesota. He was elected Governor in 2002 and was re-elected in 2006. He did run for another term in 2010. He is a member of the United States Republican Party. He was succeeded by Mark Dayton. Pawlenty ran for governor again in the 2018 election, but lost the Republican nomination to county commissioner Jeff Johnson. Pawlenty ran for president in 2012. == Personal life == Tim Pawlenty´s wife is Mary Pawlenty. Pawlenty has an also written a book. At right is Pawlenty´s signature. Pawlenty is a Republican. Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Minnesota
title: Tim Pawlenty
